thread.title: Solgar - win luxury spa day for two - terms and conditions
thread.title_full: Solgar - win luxury spa day for two - terms and conditions - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Solgar - win luxury spa day for two - terms and conditions
text: 1. This prize draw is open to residents of the UK, Channel Islands, Isle of Man and Republic of Ireland aged 18 years or over, except employees of Telegraph Media Group Limited and its group companies (“Promoter”), and Solgar Inc (“Solgar”), their families, agents or anyone else professionally associated with the draw. 2. Details of how to enter form part of the terms and conditions. It is a condition of entry that all rules are accepted as final and that the competitor agrees to abide by these rules. The decision of the judges is final and no correspondence will be entered into. 3. Entries must be submitted via www.telegraph.co.uk/solgar and entry is restricted to one per person. Once submitted, entries cannot be amended in any way. 4. Late, illegible, incomplete, defaced or corrupt entries or entries sent through agencies and third parties will not be accepted. No responsibility can be accepted for lost entries and proof of despatch will not be accepted as proof of receipt. The winners will be drawn at random from all entries received by the closing date. The winners’ names and counties can be obtained by sending a sae to Solgar – Temple Spa Treatment Prize Draw Winners, SPARK, Telegraph Media Group, 111 Buckingham Palace Road, London SW1W 0DT within one month after the closing date of the prize draw. 5. All entries must be received by midnight on Sunday, September 20, 2015. 6. The winners will be contacted by the Promoter by telephone or email within seven days of the closing date of the prize draw. Should the Promoter be unable to contact a winner or should a winner be unable to accept their prize, the Promoter reserves the right to award that prize to an alternative winner, drawn in accordance with these terms and conditions. 7. The prizes as described are available on the date of publication. Should a prize become unavailable, a substitute of equal value will be provided. 8. Three winning entrants will each win a Temple Spa signature spa day for two up to a total value £330, at one of the following venues of their choice: • Dormy House Hotel & Spa, Willersey Hill Broadway, Worcestershire; • Bayliffscourt Hotel & Spa, Climping, West Sussex; • Wynard Hall, Tees Valley; • The Swan, Lavenham, Suffolk ; • Alexander House, Turners Hill, East Grinstead, West Sussex; or • Feversham Arms, Helmsley, North Yorkshire. 9. Each prize must be taken as one package. 10. The prizes are valid on Mondays to Fridays only. Prizes must be booked by November 30, 2015 and taken by February 29, 2016. 10. The prize does not include travel to or from the event, accommodation, personal expenditure or incidental costs. 11. The prizes are subject to availability, non transferable and there are no cash alternatives. 12. The winners may be required to participate in reasonable publicity on behalf of Solgar and the Promoter. 13. Entrants’ data will be used for the purpose of administration of this prize draw and in accordance with the permissions granted or withheld at the point of entry. 14. Events may occur that render the prize draw itself or the awarding of the prizes impossible due to reasons beyond the control of the Promoter. Accordingly the Promoter may, at its absolute discretion, vary or amend the promotion and the entrant agrees that no liability shall attach to the Promoter as a result thereof. 15. The Telegraph is responsible for the first part of the promotion, which is the publication and adjudication of the prize draw. Provision of the prizes is the responsibility of Solgar. 16. These Terms and Conditions are to be interpreted in accordance with English law and any dispute arising out of these Terms or their subject matter is subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the English Courts. Promoter: Telegraph Media Group Limited, 111 Buckingham Palace Road, London SW1W 0DT.
